.. blockdiag::

    blockdiag {
      orientation = landscape;

      MainUI -> URL_Analysis;
      TouchUI -> URL_Analysis;
      UI... -> URL_Analysis;
      URL_Analysis -> plugin;
      URL_Analysis -> command;
      URL_Analysis -> xpl-command;
      URL_Analysis -> root;
      URL_Analysis -> events;
      stats_manager -> events;
      URL_Analysis -> stats_manager;
      URL_Analysis -> stats;
      URL_Analysis -> base;
      URL_Analysis -> account;
      URL_Analysis -> repo;
    }
